name: Moo Times Of Betsy: Episode 2
description:
Originally started as an old webcomic series around 2011-2013 on my website, Moo Times of Betsy is a visual novel game series that focuses on the plush animal witchy cow name Betsy the Lotus Cow and her owners, Missy and Mister. 

Episode 2  introduces the dark counterpart of Betsy who appears one day and makes it known that Betsy's perfect life will soon be disrupted due to her past life. This was made during NaNoReno 2020.

If you happen to spot any errors, please don't hesitate to let me know!

Disclaimer:

Please do not sell or redistribute the game as this is copyrighted by me. If you wish to review the game, please send me a message at dchin@redlotusdesignz.com with your permission to do so. Thanks!
